name: Minotaur of the maze
description:
Submitted to the reload magazine x in the keep minijam

Story:

you play as the great minotaur of crete, trapped within your labyrinth. One day, you decide enough is enough, and you decide to break out of the labyrinth. However, such a task is not easy as you will encounter hordes of monsters to stop your path as your health continuously drains.

controls:

WASD - move

mouse - look

left click - fire

space - jump
